scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c cyan,magenta "pnpm --dir platform/apps/api dev" "pnpm --dir platform/apps/web dev"
scripts.prisma:reset-seed: pnpm --dir platform/apps/api prisma migrate reset --force && pnpm --dir platform/apps/api prisma:generate && pnpm --dir platform/apps/api prisma:seed
scripts.postinstall: node scripts/link-prisma-client.js || echo 'Skipping prisma:link (script not found)'
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --dir platform/apps/web exec eslint . --fix && node scripts/check-no-any-no-assert.js
scripts.ci: pnpm lint && pnpm --dir platform/apps/api test:smoke && pnpm ci:sdk && pnpm build && pnpm --dir platform/apps/web budgets && pnpm ci:e2e
scripts.build:legacy: pnpm build:shared && pnpm build:api && pnpm build:web
